    • departure

      public boolean departure()
      Method to know if an animal can get out of the Farm
      Returns:
      boolean true if age of animal is greater or equal to its departureAge, exception for Horse and Pig

    • calculateAnualCost

      public double calculateAnualCost()
      Method to know how much does it cost to keep the animal anually
      Returns:
      double the maintenance cost of the animal = anualFoodPrice + extras
